activities: Personal information may be collected in the course of Kroll's provision of any of the following services to its individual and corporate clients and/or their legal counsel ("Clients"): computer forensics, information security, data breach response, and data analytics services and other related services ("Services"). Kroll acts as a data processor in the collection of such personal information on behalf of its Clients and also on behalf of its affiliates to aid them in their provision of Services to Clients globally including in the EU. Personal information is collected in the EU by the Client and (i) sent to Kroll in the United States by the Client or a Kroll affiliate for processing, or (ii) obtained by Kroll from the Client in the EU and brought back to the United States for processing. Personal information may also be received from subjects through the subject's voluntary submission in writing, electronic submission via Kroll's website, or from Clients in connection with requests for Services Kroll provides.
corpofftitle1: Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
